header_text: You enjoy strategy games but have recently had more trouble keeping up. At the last game night, you made a silly mistake during your favorite game. Since then, you can't stop obsessing over whether your friends noticed.

elements.text: You mention your concern to a close friend who reassures you that it is no big deal. Finally, you can stop obsessing and, instead, remember the night more...

elements.name: You enjoy strategy games but have recently had more trouble keeping up. At the last game night, you made a silly mistake during your favorite game. Since then, you can't stop obsessing over whether your friends noticed._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
